Class GaugeRenderer.Band

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.render.circular.GaugeRenderer.Band
Enclosing class:
GaugeRenderer
public static final class GaugeRenderer.Band extends Object
Defines a colored value band on the gauge scale.
Since:
2025-06-01 Part of the Zero-Allocation Render Path. High-frequency execution safe.
Version:
1.0.0
